bill_title: place a moratorium on the acquisition of property by the Department of Game, Fish and Parks pending repair of certain state-owned dams.
keywords: Department of Game, Fish, and Parks

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to place a moratorium on the acquisition of property by the Department of Game, Fish and Parks pending repair of certain state-owned dams. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Department of Game, Fish and Parks, after the effective date of this Act, may acquire no additional public or private property by purchase, lease, or condemnation proceedings, until the department has completed the repairs of all dams under the department's jurisdiction. For purposes of this Act, repairs include repairs or construction activities away from the original site of the dam if such activities are necessary to address needs, problems, or potential danger to persons or property associated with the current structure of the dam. This Act is repealed effective July 1, 2001. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
